# Pricing That Makes Sense

Start free, scale as you grow. No hidden fees, no surprise bills.

## Plans

### Free
**$0/month**

Perfect for side projects and learning.

- **100,000** API calls/month
- **Unlimited** endpoints
- **Global** CDN
- **Real-time** logs (7 days)
- **Community** support
- **HTTPS** included

[Start Free](https://acme-corp.com/signup)

---

### Pro
**$29/month**

For growing projects and startups.

- **1,000,000** API calls/month
- Everything in Free, plus:
- **Real-time** logs (30 days)
- **Custom** domains
- **Email** support (24h response)
- **API** analytics dashboard
- **Rate limiting** controls

[Start 14-Day Trial](https://acme-corp.com/signup?plan=pro)

---

### Team
**$99/month**

For teams shipping production APIs.

- **10,000,000** API calls/month
- Everything in Pro, plus:
- **Real-time** logs (90 days)
- **Team** collaboration (5 seats)
- **Priority** support (4h response)
- **Advanced** analytics
- **Custom** rate limits
- **Staging** environments

[Start 14-Day Trial](https://acme-corp.com/signup?plan=team)

---

### Enterprise
**Custom pricing**

For companies at scale.

- **Unlimited** API calls
- Everything in Team, plus:
- **Dedicated** infrastructure
- **SLA** guarantees (99.99%)
- **24/7** phone support
- **Custom** contracts
- **On-premise** option
- **Training** & onboarding

[Contact Sales](mailto:sales@acme-corp.com)

---

## Add-Ons

**Extra API Calls**
- $0.10 per 10,000 calls
- Automatically applied if you exceed plan limits

**Additional Team Seats**
- $10/user/month (Team plan)
- Unlimited on Enterprise

**Extended Log Retention**
- $20/month for 1 year retention
- $50/month for 2 year retention

## FAQ

**How are API calls counted?**
One request = one API call. Webhooks and scheduled functions also count. Failed requests (5xx errors) don't count.

**What happens if I exceed my limit?**
We'll automatically apply overage charges at $0.10/10K calls. You'll get email alerts at 80% and 100% usage.

**Can I change plans anytime?**
Yes! Upgrade or downgrade anytime. Changes take effect immediately. Downgrades are prorated.

**Do you offer non-profit discounts?**
Yes! Email us at hello@acme-corp.com with your non-profit documentation for 50% off any plan.

**What payment methods do you accept?**
Credit card (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), PayPal, and ACH transfer (Enterprise only).
